<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_516</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_516</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Calculadora estadística</string>
            <string language="en">Statistical calculator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistischer Rechner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calculatrice statistique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calculadora estatística</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcolatore statistico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στατιστικός υπολογιστής</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones una calculadora estadística. El programa permite hacer cálculos estadísticos de una variable y de dos. Se proponen ejemplos y ejercicios que muestran todas las posiblidades de la calculadora.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain statistical calculators. The program allows the student to carry out statistical calculations using one or two variables. It includes examples and exercises which explain all the features on the calculator.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">estadística</string>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">descriptiva</string>
            <string language="en">descriptive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">bidimensional</string>
            <string language="en">two-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">unidimensional</string>
            <string language="en">one-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, statistische Rechner zu erklären. Das Programm 
erlaubt dem Kursteilnehmer, statistische Berechnungen mit ein oder 
zwei Variablen durchzuführen. Es schließt Beispiele und 
Übungen ein, die alle Merkmale auf dem Rechner erklären.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer les calculatrices statistiques. Le 
programme permet à l'étudiant d'effectuer des calculs statistiques 
en utilisant un ou deux variables. Il inclut les exemples et les
exercices qui expliquent tous les dispositifs sur la calculatrice.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
calculadoras estatísticas. O programa permite que o estudante 
realize cálculos estatísticos usando uma ou dois variáveis. 
Inclui os exemplos e os exercícios que explicam todas as 
características na calculadora.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare i calcolatori statistici. Il programma permette che 
l'allievo effettui i calcoli statistici usando una o due variabile. 
Include gli esempi e le esercitazioni che spiegano tutte le 
caratteristiche sul calcolatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει τους στατιστικούς υπολογιστές. Το πρόγραμμα 
επιτρέπει στο σπουδαστή για να πραγματοποιήσει τους στατιστικούς 
υπολογισμούς χρησιμοποιώντας μια ή δύο μεταβλητές. 
Περιλαμβάνει τα παραδείγματα και τις ασκήσεις που εξηγούν 
όλα τα χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα στον υπολογιστή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibend</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zweidimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eindimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">descriptif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bidimensionnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unidimensionnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descritivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gráfico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bidimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">one-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unidimensionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
